Record Powerball drawing

Four in Mass. get $1 million, but big winners in Ariz., Mo.

No Bay Staters hit the record $579.9 million Powerball jackpot, but four tickets sold in Massachusetts are worth $1 million, officials said. (Globe, 9:15 a.m.)

Lindsay Lohan arrested

Police said the actress struck a woman in the face with her hand during an argument at a New York City nightclub. The woman did not require medical attention. (AP, 10:47 a.m.)

Pictures > Nets 95, Celtics 83

Disorder on the court: Celts, Nets brawl

Rajon Rondo confronted Brooklyn's Kris Humphries after Humphries fouled Kevin Garnett in the 2d quarter. Rondo was ejected and may face league discipline.

Officials: Ex-bank worker stole $112,000

Prosecutors say Debra Antonitis is charged with mail and wire fraud for allegedly stealing the money while she was a manager for a Wrentham bank. (AP, 7:58 a.m.)

FBI releases files on Kevin White

A 1975 FBI inquiry into alleged bid-rigging by former Boston mayor Kevin White emerged in new detail yesterday after a website posted White's FBI file.
